person.persName: Nathaniel Southgate Shaler (Campbell County, Kentucky, student, teacher, capt 5th Ky Artillery USA)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, student, soldier, and teacher. Kentucky native. Son of Nathaniel Burger Shaler and Ann Hinde Southgate Shaler. Married to Sophia Penn Page Shaler in 1862. Student in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Graduated from Harvard University in Cambridge, Middlesex County, Massachusetts, on July 8, 1862. Served in the 5th Kentucky Battery (U.S.A.) as captain.
